messages.subject: Unschooling college
messages.msgSnippet: Great site on unschooling college! So how do you earn  the college degree you want by learning from the world, instead of at a regular  college?
messages.messageBody:
Great site on unschooling college!



So how do you earn the college degree you want by learning from the world,
instead of at a regular college?



_http://www.homestead.com/peaceandcarrots/CollegeHowTo.html_
(http://www.homestead.com/peaceandcarrots/CollegeHowTo.html)

messages.subject: Unschooling college
messages.msgSnippet: For those who ve been thinking about college lately (or those who simply like to read about growing unschoolers), I ran across this really cool site. This
messages.messageBody:
For those who've been thinking about college lately (or those who simply like to read about growing unschoolers), I ran across this really cool site. This young woman is an absolute inspiration!

http://www.homestead.com/peaceandcarrots/collegehowto.html

Enjoy!

--danielle
